mapper.select: select CO_ID, RESC_KEY, LOCALE, RESC_KEY_VALUE, RESC_KEY_VALUE_DESC from om002m
mapper.insert: insert into om002m(CO_ID, RESC_KEY, LOCALE, RESC_KEY_VALUE, RESC_KEY_VALUE_DESC) values (#{coId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{rescKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{rescKeyValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{rescKeyValueDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
